articles.title: Patriots rookie TreVeyon Henderson announces engagement
articles.description:
It's been quite a year already for the explosive running back.

The post Patriots rookie TreVeyon Henderson announces engagement appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots rookie TreVeyon Henderson announced his engagement on September 10, 2025.
Henderson's engagement adds to his notable year as a first-year player.
Local fans celebrate Henderson's personal milestone, enhancing community connection with the team.

articles.title: Red Sox rookie Connelly Early discussed his dominant MLB debut
articles.description:
“I can’t think of a better way to start your career," outfielder Rob Refsnyder said of Early's performance in Tuesday's win.

The post Red Sox rookie Connelly Early discussed his dominant MLB debut appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Red Sox rookie Connelly Early excelled in his MLB debut on September 10, 2025.
Outfielder Rob Refsnyder praised Early's performance, highlighting its significance for the team's future.
Early's success boosts local fan excitement and optimism for the Red Sox season.

articles.title: Whatever rugby icon Ilona Maher does next it will be Maher-vellous
articles.description:
“I hate it when people say that about me, ‘Oh, she’s just an Instagrammer,'” the Vermont native told her sisters during their House of Maher podcast.

The post Whatever rugby icon Ilona Maher does next it will be Maher-vellous appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Ilona Maher, a Vermont native, discusses her rugby career on the House of Maher podcast.
Maher aims to redefine her image beyond social media, emphasizing her athletic achievements.
Boston residents can expect increased visibility for rugby and female athletes through Maher's influence.

articles.title: One injured in Boston scaffolding collapse
articles.description:
The worker was transported to a local hospital.

The post One injured in Boston scaffolding collapse appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: One worker injured in scaffolding collapse in Boston on September 10, 2025.
The injured worker was transported to a local hospital for treatment.
This incident raises safety concerns for construction sites across Boston.

articles.title: Wellesley native Katie Benzan is making history as the youngest female GM in the G League
articles.description:
Back in 2011, when 13-year-old Katie Benzan took the varsity floor as an eighth-grader for Noble and Greenough, players from the Tabor Academy bench snickered. The plucky, 80-pound sharpshooter was relatively quiet in the first half. Even her mother, assistant coach Kim Benzan, asked coach Alex Gallagher if he was positive she was ready for […]

The post Wellesley native Katie Benzan is making history as the youngest female GM in the G League appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Katie Benzan becomes the youngest female GM in G League history at age 24.
Benzan, a Wellesley native, previously played at Noble and Greenough School.
Her appointment may inspire local female athletes in Boston to pursue leadership roles.
